name: PU Alerts - For F.E. to B.E. SPPU Students
description: Now no need to check SPPU site again and again (unipune.ac.in). Just Install this app and stay alert. You will get every alert provided by SPPU (Pune University). Now just be calm. Also, all the users can discuss in-app and solve each others queries collaboratively. It also comprises of Previous Years SPPU Question Papers (With SPPU QBank).  Not Official app of SPPU. It just provides updates provided by SPPU (Pune University).  Get Alerts of :  Result  Syllabus  Timetable  Any Changes  And Other main changes by SPPU  Developed By Shreyas Sharad Patil SPDroid  ------------------------------------------------  If you are facing some issue or want to contact, please do not hesitate me to contact on below. Contact: Personal Site: http://patilshreyas.github.io Email: spdroid.developer@gmail.com
